definitions.definition: One who has been perverted; one who has turned to error; one who has turned to a twisted sense of values or morals.
A person whose sexual habits are not considered acceptable.
definitions.example: Those perverts were trying to spy on us while we changed clothes!

definitions.definition: To turn another way; to divert.
To corrupt; to cause to be untrue; corrupted or otherwise impure
definitions.example: How could stopping someone from killing himself or herself "pervert the course of justice"?

definitions.definition: To misapply, misuse, use for a nefarious purpose
definitions.example: He has perverted his talents to dishonest gain.

definitions.definition: To become perverted; to take the wrong course.
